============================================================================
IE9 scrolling fix: https://github.com/smashingboxes/OwlCarousel2/issues/482
============================================================================

Attention! This theme uses a OWL Carousel develop files (not master files as usual) to fix IE9 scrolling issues.




CSS:
--------

owl.carousel.css
owl.theme.default.css
owl.carousel.plugins.css


Plugin file includes:

owl.animate.css
owl.autoheight.css
owl.lazyload.css
owl.video.css



JS:
--------

owl.carousel.js
owl.carousel.plugins.js


Plugin file includes:

owl.support.js
owl.lazyload.js
owl.autoheight.js
owl.video.js
owl.animate.js
owl.autoplay.js
owl.navigation.js
owl.hash.js
owl.autorefresh.js
